list.title: FormInput
list.description: Functions and objects and such that have to do with the form input.

list.title: FormInput.Machines
list.description: Functions for each individual machine input.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect
list.description: Machine functions that allow the user to input multiple selections for one or more questionsas opposed to just one. This means that the multiselect questions need to be formatted andsplit up so that each selection can have its own entry.See the [Multiselect Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial multiselect} for a breakdown of how multiselect machine functions work.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.cnc
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the CNC sheet. This function is a [Multiselect Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Multiselect Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial multiselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.cnc.machineList
list.description: The list of machines that the tasks have been performed on. Received from {@param json}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.cnc.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.sewing
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the sewing/embroidery machine sheet. This function is a [Multiselect Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Multiselect Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial multiselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.sewing.machineList
list.description: The list of machines that the tasks have been performed on. Received from {@param json}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.sewing.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.threeDp
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the 3D Printer sheet. This function is a [Multiselect Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Multiselect Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial multiselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.threeDp.machineList
list.description: The list of machines that the tasks have been performed on. Received from {@param json}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.threeDp.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.wideFormat
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the wide format printer sheet. This function is a [Multiselect Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Multiselect Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial multiselect}.Note that the list referenced in this function is called `replacementList` because the question that gives us this list gives us a list ofreplacement items rather than a list of machines.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.wideFormat.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.MultiSelect.wideFormat.replacementList
list.description: The list of supply replacements that have been performed. Received from {@param json}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect
list.description: Machine functions that only allow the user to input one selection per question.See the [Single Select Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial singleselect} for a breakdown of how multiselect machine functions work.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.cnc.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.cricut
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the Cricut sheet. This function is a [Single Select Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Single Select Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial singleselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.cricut.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.cricut.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.laser
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the laser cutter sheet. This function is a [Single Select Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Single Select Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial singleselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.laser.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.laser.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.serger
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the serger sheet. This function is a [Single Select Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Single Select Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial singleselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.serger.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.serger.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.sewing.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.threeDp.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.vinyl
list.description: Function that puts the form submission information into the vinyl cutter sheet. This function is a [Single Select Machine Function]{@link FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect}. To see a breakdown on how these functions work, see the [Single Select Machine Functions Tutorial]{@tutorial singleselect}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.vinyl.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.vinyl.range
list.description: The range of cells that we are working with. Received from {@param sheet}.

list.title: FormInput.Machines.SingleSelect.wideFormat.cell
list.description: The cell where we will start inserting data. Received from {@constant Range}.

list.title: FormInput.adder
list.description: This function takes the data given to us by the form and decides which [Machine]{@link Machines} function we want to run.It uses the user's answer to the machine question to determine this.

list.title: FormInput.adder.jsonString
list.description: A variable that will hold the json data from {@param e} as a string

list.title: FormInput.adder.sheet
list.description: The spreadsheet we are going to deposit the raw {@type JSON} data into.

list.title: FormInput.makeTrigger
list.description: This triggers the script to run. You most likely won't have to mess with this.

list.title: FormInput.test
list.description: This is just a fake json entry that I use for testing. If you need to actually make any human senseof this or any other entry, I suggest pasting this into a json linter such as jsonlint.com./nAll raw json entries are placed in a hidden sheet called "test." You can unhide it if you need to access any of the raw form entries, but please hide it again when you're done.

list.title: JSON
list.description: A json object. In our case, these are used as the raw data received from the form. You can think of a json objectas a collection of data that's all wrapped up in a neat little package.

list.title: Range
list.description: A range of cells in a Sheet.

list.title: SendEmail
list.description: Functions and variables that are involved in sending the reminder email.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail
list.description: Function that sends a summary of maintenence tasks that are due soon, overdue, and wide format printer stock that needsto be ordered. Frequency of emails is set in the trigger.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.email
list.description: The email address that the email will be sent to

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintNowDue
list.description: The list of dates that coorespond to a machine and a task.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintNowMachine
list.description: The list of machines that need maintenance now.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintNowService
list.description: The list of services that need to be completed now. Each object cooresponds to a machine.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintSoonDue
list.description: The list of dates that coorespond to a machine and a task.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintSoonMachine
list.description: The list of machines that will need maintenance soon.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.maintSoonService
list.description: The list of services that need to be completed soon. Each object cooresponds to a machine.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.sheet
list.description: The sheet we are getting the data from.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.suppliesNames
list.description: The list of supplies that need to be ordered soon.

list.title: SendEmail.sendUpdateEmail.suppliesQty
list.description: The list of supply quantities that coorespond to a supply

list.title: Sheet
list.description: A reference to a specific spreadsheet on a Google Sheet workbook.
